article_node.title: Dyson OnTrac Headphones are now 48% off for Amazon Labor Day Sale
article_node.summary: Dyson is offering a nearly 50% discount on its OnTrac headphones, cutting the price from $499 to $259.99, while its Airwrap multi‑styler sees a $100 markdown to $399.99. The article also highlights a range of Labor Day sales across Amazon, including deals on electronics, appliances, and home goods, with many items discounted up to 80% and free Prime shipping for members. These promotions are part of a broader Labor Day shopping event that runs through September 1, 2025, featuring daily new deals and early‑access offers for Prime members.
